about_the_game:
Feats of Legend: 20 Infernal Feats


Do I smell brimstone? Inside this edition of Feats of Legend is 20 new infernal feats. These feats are designed for use with any character looking to deal with the lower planes. Master hellfire, learn to fight like a Kyton, shoot unholy bullets or pledge your mortal soul for a a taste of power.

Inside, you'll find awesome new feats like:

  • Blasphemous Tongue
  • Call of the Damned
  • Chains of Perdition
  • Improved Chains of Perdition
  • Dark Channel
  • Devil's Advocate
  • Fiendish Codex
  • Fire and Brimstone
  • Improved Fire and Brimstone
  • Hellfire Initiate
  • Hellfire Acolyte
  • Hellfire Master
  • Inured to the Infernal
  • Luck of the Devil
  • Pledged to Darkness
  • Protection of the Pit
  • Improved Protection of the Pit
  • Greater Protection of the Pit
  • Speak of the Devil
  • Tongue of the Pit

Up your game with Feats of Legend!

Converted for Fantasy Grounds by Rob Twohy

Released on September 03, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included Pathfinder Ruleset (3.5E Compatible).

Do I smell brimstone? Inside this edition of Feats of Legend is 20 new infernal feats. These feats are designed for use with any character looking to deal with the lower planes. Master hellfire, learn to fight like a Kyton, shoot unholy bullets or pledge your mortal soul for a a taste of power.

Inside, you'll find awesome new feats like:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
